Articles.Content:
Hello.

I've been playing KSP since 0.13 and tried making some parts with varying success.

I just couldn't lurk any more, so I've decided to join the forum.
Welcome aboard! I think I might be correct in saying that you've been playing for quite a bit longer than I have... What have you done so far? Sounds like you have a future here!

Welcome to the community at last Red Fang, I started with 0.13 as well

Have fun and don't forget, real men land on winglets
Welcome aboard! I started playing on version 0.23.
Hey, we joined in the same version, I think! (can't remember the exact version I started in, but I'm fairly sure it's 0.13) Back in the days of no legs, eh? Boy were those "landings" interesting...
